trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around February 2nd 2009
Summary: Green sparkling fireball heading south west.
divs: Sighting Detailsfirst, i am not the best typist in the world. I was at my computer at home and out of my periphials i saw this green fireball about 1000 to 2000 feet in altitude shoot towards the south west. After that i called a friend that lived down the road who i assumed lived right under where the fire ball would have been. I was like i think i just saw a ufo. and he asked if i saw the big green light too.he had seen it from about a mile away from where i was. he was not at his home and had a clear view of what i saw. so after talking to him about it i let it go. About 3 days later i had been talking to friends and these 3 guys came up to me who i had been friends with asked if i saw the green fireball too. and i said yes of course, they then proceeded to tell me that they saw it too from 2 miles the other direction i am from my other friend. Now i do not know what this is, but i have been interested in the paranormal and ufos my whole life and was just wondering if anyone else had seen this that night. and i know it sounds stupid like a green fireball. but i gave my friend no hint of what i saw and he started talking about it before i did about what he saw. so if anyone saw it please speak up because i am really curious.
